hackathon-description-text: HackTCNJ is an annual hackathon at The College of New Jersey.
hackathon-rules:
By registering & attending, you agree to the following policies:
MLH's Data Sharing Notice
MLH's Privacy Policy
MLH's Contest Terms and Conditions
MLH's Code of Conduct
We partner with Major League Hacking (MLH) as a MLH Member Event. By registering & attending you authorize us to share certain application/registration information for event administration, ranking, MLH administration, and occasional messages about hackathons in line with the MLH Privacy Policy.
If you will be a minor at any time during the event, you must have your guardian sign the Minor Participation Waiver.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Use your tech skills for good and hack online harassment! Build a software solution that can help reduce the frequency and/or severity of online harassment. Members of the winning team receive Hack Harassment Battery Packs!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2000 Pennington Rd, Ewing Township, NJ 08618, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Idea must stand out and be unique, while also being feasible to implement.
Hack implementation must demonstrate strong technical skill.
Good ideas and hard work pay off, but a successful hack is one that is ready for use!

hackathon-location-address: 2000 Pennington Rd, Ewing Township, NJ 08618, USA
hackathon-description-header: Feb 25 & 26 2017! | Dedicate 24 hours to extend your knowledge and learn a new technology, food, drink, shelter, and prizes included.
hackathon-location-description: The College of New Jersey - Education Building
